data.comment: The match is underway at Estadio Martínez Valero.
Cadiz have been awarded a corner by Carlos Del Cerro Grande.
In the minute 4, In Elche a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Elche at Estadio Martínez Valero.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a throw-in for Elche, close to Cadiz's area.
In the minute 6, Cadiz awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Cadiz.
Free kick for Elche in their own half.
In the minute 10, Can Cadiz capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Ball safe as Elche is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Cadiz.
In the minute 12, Gonzalo Verdu (Elche) gets a yellow card.
Lucas Boye is booked for the home team.
Attention is being given to Cadiz’s Jairo Izquierdo and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 15, Cadiz's Jairo Izquierdo is back in action after a slight knock.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a free kick to Cadiz in their own half.
Elche awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 17, Carlos Del Cerro Grande awards the away team a throw-in.
Cadiz awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Cadiz in Elche.
In the minute 21, Alvaro Cervera (Cadiz) is making a first substitution, with Alberto Perea replacing Jairo Izquierdo.
Free kick for Elche in their own half.
Goal kick for Cadiz at Estadio Martínez Valero.
In the minute 27, Ball goes out of play for a Cadiz goal kick.
Free kick for Elche in the half of Cadiz.
Diego Gonzalez (Elche) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 29, Cadiz have a goal kick.
Throw-in Cadiz.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a free kick to Cadiz in their own half.
In the minute 32, Throw-in for Cadiz in their own half.
Ivan Marcone has recovered and rejoins the match in Elche.
The match at Estadio Martínez Valero has been interrupted briefly for a check on Ivan Marcone, who is down injured.
In the minute 36, Elche drives forward and Pere Milla gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Elche.
At Estadio Martínez Valero, Elche are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 37, Cadiz awarded a free kick in their own half.
Elche take a 1-0 lead thanks to Lucas Boye.
That's a fine assist from Pere Milla.
In the minute 39, Throw-in for Cadiz in their own half.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a free kick to Cadiz.
Free kick for Elche in their own half.
In the minute 45, Elche drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
At Estadio Martínez Valero the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a free kick to Cadiz in their own half.
In the minute 45, Carlos Del Cerro Grande awards the home team a throw-in.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a free kick to Elche in their own half.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Cadiz in their own half.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande blows to end the first-half.
Lucas Boye has been booked for the second time in this match - the red card is coming out!
The second half has started at Estadio Martínez Valero.
In the minute 47, Alvaro Gimenez of Cadiz gets in a strike, but is off target.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande awards Elche a goal kick.
Can Cadiz capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Elche's half?
In the minute 49, Cadiz have been awarded a corner by Carlos Del Cerro Grande.
Cadiz have been awarded a corner by Carlos Del Cerro Grande.
Elche awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 51, Throw-in for Cadiz at Estadio Martínez Valero.
Corner awarded to Cadiz.
Ball safe as Elche is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 54, Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a free kick to Elche in their own half.
Cadiz's Alex has been booked in Elche.
Alvaro Gimenez equalizes with a header to make it 1-1.
In the minute 55, Alberto Perea with an assist there.
The home team replace Guido Carrillo with Fidel.
Jorge Almiron is making the team's second substitution at Estadio Martínez Valero with Raul Guti replacing Luismi.
In the minute 58, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
The away team have replaced Filip Malbasic with Jorge Pombo. This is the second substitution made today by Alvaro Cervera.
In the minute 59, Cadiz awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Elche in the half of Cadiz.
Pedro Alcala is replacing Fali for Cadiz at Estadio Martínez Valero.
Cadiz awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 60, Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a free kick to Cadiz.
Pere Milla for Elche has been booked by Carlos Del Cerro Grande and receives a first yellow card.
Can Elche get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cadiz's half?
In the minute 62, Free kick Elche.
Cadiz have been awarded a corner by Carlos Del Cerro Grande.
Ivan Marcone (Elche) has received a yellow card from Carlos Del Cerro Grande.
In the minute 65, In Elche, Marcos Mauro (Cadiz) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Elche to take a throw-in in Cadiz territory.
Alvaro Cervera is making the team's fourth substitution at Estadio Martínez Valero with Yann Bodiger replacing Alex.
In Elche a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 68, Bobby Adekanye is replacing Salvi Sanchez for the away team.
Jens Jonsson (Cadiz) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 69, Elche are coming forward and Fidel gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Elche.
Free kick for Elche in their own half.
In the minute 71, Corner awarded to Cadiz.
Throw-in Elche.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a Cadiz throw-in in Elche's half.
In the minute 74, Elche awarded a throw-in in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Elche.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a free kick to Elche in their own half.
In the minute 76, Alberto Perea gets his shot on target but fails to score for Cadiz.
Jorge Pombo of Cadiz smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Cadiz.
In the minute 81, Free kick for Elche in their own half.
Ball safe as Elche is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Elche awarded a free kick in their own half.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Cadiz have been awarded a corner by Carlos Del Cerro Grande.
Free kick for Cadiz in their own half.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-1.
Omenuke Mfulu is on a sub for Ivan Marcone for Elche.
At Estadio Martínez Valero, Tete Morente has been yellow-carded for the home team.
